name: Stick'y Race
description:
What's this Game.
     you playing with stick that never stop bouncing. you take control of bouncing direction with turning the stick using a mouse.
there is portals transport you and orbs that makes your stick dash to particular direction.
combine those mechanics to finish the level in a short time.

How to Play :

  • Move the mouse in X-axis to Turn the Stick.
  • Press and hold "Space" to dash when you reach the dashing orbs.

      this version is for testing the idea.
if you want to test them out. it's gonna be kind of you if you leave feedback or suggestion in comment below.
